remoteStorage¶

Initialization¶

const remoteStorage = new RemoteStorage();

Prototype methods¶

setApiKeys()¶

Set the OAuth key/ID for either GoogleDrive or Dropbox backend support. Use the method twice to set both.

Arguments:
  • type (string) – Either ‘googledrive’ or ‘dropbox’
  • keys (object) – Must contain property ‘clientId’ for GoogleDrive, or ‘appKey’ for Dropbox
